dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect information necessary to improve your experience in the app. We do not share your personal data with third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use third-party services for analytics and advertising. These services may collect anonymous data about your usage.

ads.title: Advertising
ads.content: We use ads to keep the service free. Ads are personalized based on your interests.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For privacy questions, please contact us through the contact form.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using our service, you agree to these terms of service.

usage.title: Service Usage
usage.content: The service is provided 'as is' and must be used in accordance with applicable laws. Conversations with biblical characters are generated by artificial intelligence and may not fully reflect biblical events or teachings.

aiDisclaimer.title: Artificial Intelligence Disclaimer
aiDisclaimer.content: Responses and interactions with biblical characters are generated by AI language models. While we strive to maintain accuracy and fidelity to the biblical text, responses may contain inaccuracies or interpretations that do not reflect the official doctrine of any religious denomination. We recommend that you always consult the Bible and qualified religious authorities for matters of faith and doctrine.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All service content is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. AI-generated conversations are for personal use and should not be reproduced or distributed without permission.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: We are not liable for indirect damages caused by the use of the service. AI-generated responses are for educational and entertainment purposes and should not be considered as spiritual or religious advice.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
